alert.note: Alert for Wibaux (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 08 at 4:55PM MDT by NWS Glasgow
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Wibaux County through 530 PM MDT... At 454 PM MDT, Doppler radar is tracking a strong thunderstorm near Wibaux. This storm is moving northwest at 5 miles per hour. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Wibaux and Yates. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
